definitions.definition: (of words or symbols) The entity, perception, feeling or concept thereby represented or evoked.
The value, purpose, importance, point or significance (of something beyond the fact of that thing's existence).
The object or concept that a word or phrase denotes, or that which a sentence says.
To have conviction in (something said or expressed); to be sincere in (what one says).
definitions.example: Does she really mean what she said to him last night?

definitions.definition: To cause or produce (a given result); to bring about (a given result).
definitions.example: One faltering step means certain death.

definitions.definition: (usually with to) To be of some level of importance.
definitions.example: Formality and titles mean nothing in their circle.

definitions.definition: Expressing some intention or significance; meaningful.
